We want to reduce working time / to go from 5 working days / week to 4 days, and from 38h / week to 30h # 1MaisPS
The PS defends the idea that the people who work with us must pay their social security contributions at home, and at the Belgian rate # 1MaisPS
To avoid relocations, the PS has tabled a bill to protect workers from collective redundancies # 1MaisPS
Thanks to this law, collective redundancies will be prohibited if they are justified only by the sole financial interest of the shareholder
It is the duty of the @PSofficiel to broaden the social safety net for self-employed workers # 1MAYS

The PS is the voice of the workers # 1MAPS
Our ideas are socially just and achievable. We chose to be on the side of the possible and the hope # 1MayPS
